text: Álex Adolfo Figueroa Muñoz (20 September 1961 – 25 December 2018) was a Chilean politician and physician. He was Minister of Health from 1996 to 2000 during the Eduardo Frei Ruiz-Tagle presidency. He was born in Santiago de Chile. Figueroa was a member of the Christian Democratic Party. Figueroa died on 25 December 2018 from liver cancer in Santiago, aged 57.Fallece Álex Figueroa, ex ministro de Salud de Eduardo Frei Ruiz-Tagle ==References== Category:1961 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from liver cancer Category:Chilean politicians Category:Chilean physicians
title: Álex Figueroa
